name: showpiece
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an extremely good example of something that deserves to be admired: The house is a showpiece of colonial architecture. [ before noun ] the city's new showpiece library

an extremely good example of something that attracts attention or admiration: This painting will be the showpiece of the exhibit.
